publicationStmt.p: Digital edition hosted on http://rickandmorty.newtfire.org and GitHub: https://github.com/dorothealint/Rick-and-Morty

encodingDesc.p: Some small changes to the original transcriptions were made including fixed spelling errors and getting rid of parentheses, brackes, and colons.

body.stage: [Open aerial view/zoom on the Smith home]
(Everything is frozen besides Morty, Rick and Summer. Morty is vacuuming Jerry with a hand vac.)

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Hurry up Morty, Grampa's about to unfreeze time. You know you really should be cleaning from top to bottom.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : I know how to vacuum Mom and Dad, Summer, I've been doing it for six months!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Then you've been doing it wrong for six months. Oh, my God, is that mildew?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : It's not my fault we froze time on a humid day!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : You have dropped so many balls, man. Do you ever get scared Grampa Rick might make me his new sidekick?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What? What kind of monster are you?

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : A competent one.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Who cares about the *belch* thing you guys are talking about? The whole point of freezing time is to stop giving a fuck. Put a shirt on your dumb dad and let's get this dumb universe rolling. Let's do this thing.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Alright, listen, you two, we froze time for a pretty long time, so when I unfreeze it, the world's time is gonna be fine, but our time's gonna need a little time to, you know, stabilize.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Our time is gonna be unstable? What does that even mean?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : It means relax and stop being a pussy, Morty. I thought you learned that by now. It also means don't touch your parents or we could shatter into countless theoretical shards.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Wait a minute, what?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : And away we go!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Uh, did we ever put that mattress under Mr. Benson?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Shhh, Morty!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : ...A THING OR TWO ABOUT... wait, what? Was the house...? When we pulled up I could have sworn the house was completely trashed.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Negative visualization, Jerry. It explains a lot about where you're at. Hi, sweety.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Hi, dad.

body.stage: (Summer and Morty recoil from Beth as she approaches to hug Rick)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Summer, Morty, are you okay?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : W-We just missed you a lot.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Yeah, we missed you so much. Too much to hug you though.

body.stage: (Rick motions Summer and Morty behind him.)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Yeah it would literally destroy them. Now listen, why do—why do—why—why don't you guys go get a free sunday ice cream, (Rick puts a rubber band around a rolled up wad of cash) go out there and get some ice creams. Here's five hundred dollars cash in unmarked moneys. I'm just gonna put it on the floor and uh, kick it on over to ya. You guys go nuts.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : This better not be a bribe. If I find a single thing out of place in this house, my love of ice cream won't save you. I'll get my jacket.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Sweety, is your shirt on backwards?

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : *Gasp*

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Uh oh.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Yeah, I like it this way. I'm not stupid.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Phew...

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : *Exhales*

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Man that guy is the Red Grin Grumble to pretending he knows what's going on. (Morty and Summer laugh) Oh you agree, huh? (Summer: Funny) You like that Red Grin Grumble reference? (Summer: Yeah.) Well guess what? I made him up. You really are your father's children. Think for yourselves, don't be sheep.

body.stage: (Mr. Benson is being loaded into an ambulance.)

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : God, I feel terrible.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Yup, it really makes you appreciate how fickle the universe can be. (Rick opens refrigerator) [Trans. Inside refrigerator] One minute you're falling off a roof for six months, the next minute, bam!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Uh, just to be clear, it was Summer's job to put the mattress under-

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : (interrupting) Uh, what? It was your job, Morty. (Summer pokes Morty.)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Nuh uh!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Yeah huh!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Actually, sorry Summer, I gotta back the M bomb on this one. I remember the conversation. We told Morty to replace all the bank's money with cookies, your job was to put the mattress under Mr. Benson.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Boom! In your face Summer! You really dropped the ball, man.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Shut up Morty, you vindictive little turd!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : You shut up you big... female asshole!

sp.speaker: Alternate Morty
sp.p: : Hey, don't shove me!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : I didn't!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : You didn't what?

sp.speaker: Alternate Summer
sp.p: : What's your problem?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What's yours?

sp.speaker: Alternate Summer
sp.p: : Shut up!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : You shut up!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Whoa whoa wh-what the hell hell hell hell hell?

body.stage: (Time splits into two - alternate timelines will be ordered from top to bottom, left to right.)

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Oh God, oh no, what did you guys just do?

sp.speaker: Summer 1
sp.p: : What do you mean?

sp.speaker: Summer 2
sp.p: : What could we do?

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Wait, what am I saying?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : *belch* Were either of you guys uncertain about anything just now?

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Oh man... I don't feel good.

sp.speaker: Morty 1
sp.p: : Am I me? I think so.

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : A-am I talking right now?

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Wait, who said that?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Alright both of you, just don't move, don't speak, don't think. I have to check something.

sp.speaker: Summer 1
sp.p: : What should we do Morty?

sp.speaker: Summer 2
sp.p: : I'm gonna help Grampa.

sp.speaker: Morty 1
sp.p: : Let's see if he needs help.

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : What do you mean you're gonna help him.

sp.speaker: Summer 1
sp.p: : Ugh, I can help too.

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : What's going on Rick?

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : What's happening Grampa?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Shut up! (Rick turns on a monitor) Oh crap are you kidding me? Two dots? This never needs to be more than one dot. The two of you made us uncertain!

sp.speaker: Morty 1
sp.p: : What do you mean?

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : What? In English?

sp.speaker: Summer 1
sp.p: : What? English please?

sp.speaker: Summer 2
sp.p: : What are you talking about?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Our time is fractured. You two somehow created a feedback loop of uncertainty that's split our reality into two equally possible impossiblities. W-we're exactly like a man capable of sustaining a platonic friendship with an attractive female co-worker. We're entirely hypothetical.

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : But I thought there were infinite timelines.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : We're not on any timeline, dummy. Look.

body.stage: (Rick opens the garage door, revealing floating cats, trees and islands.)

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Oh, my God!

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Are those cats?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : I assume they're Schrodinger's cats. A-actually, I assume they both are and aren't, just like us.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: 1 & Morty 2: Is the world gone? Where are Mom and Dad?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : “Mom and Dad?” Get your head out of your family's ass. The three of us are lost in a timeless oblivion. Your parents get to exist. They're probably living it up in some pointless grounded story about their sh*t marriage.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Cold Stone Creamery is the best. What should we do with our remaining twenty dollars?

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : You realize they sing no matter how much you tip.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Holy shit! What happened?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : I hit a deer! W-we have to tell the cops you were driving.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : W-what?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : This is Rum Raisin!

body.stage: (Beth hands Jerry her ice cream, gets out of the car and goes over to the deer.)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : It's still alive.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Well, do we- do I uh, get a big rock? Or--

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : It's not an armadillo, asshole!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : I thought that's what a man's supposed to say, it's not like I could have actually done it.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : If we were near a hospital, I could treat it, but I-I think we have to just-

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : It's okay, this is just something that happens. And even if we were in a hospital, what could we do, you're a horse surgeon, not a deer surgeon.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Well don't different animals-

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Require different levels of skill to keep alive?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Oh God...

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Get the deer in the car, Jerry.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Yes Beth.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : This is why you don't freeze time, you guys. It's incredibly irresponsible.

sp.speaker: Morty 1
sp.p: : And you did it so you could clean the house after a party.

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : And you did it so you could clean the house after a party?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Look, there's no time to hold me accountable, Morty. Like literally no time. Look around. Uncertainty is inherently unsustainable. Eventually everything either is or isn't. And we've got about four hours to be “is”.

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : Or?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : We “isn't”

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Alright, since this time crystal exists in both possibilities, and since it's impossible that I didn't nail this, I'm probably about to press this button in both possibilities at exactly the same time.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: 1 & Summer 2: How do you know you're gonna-

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Whatever you're asking, the answer is I'm amazing. And away we go!

body.stage: (Rick presses a button, the timelines almost merge)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Huh, what do you know, it's working

sp.speaker: Summer 1
sp.p: : Ow, ow ouch!

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : Whoa, ow, ow.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Oh shit.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : What the hell is wrong with you two!? I—I m—I m—I mean you four!?

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: and Summer 2: That hurt! That was painful...

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Good I'm glad it was painful. You do deserve it! I saw you, you're both *belch* all over the damn place. We've been split for twenty minutes and your lives are already scattered to the quantum f***ing wind? What the hell do either of you have to be so uncertain about? Your brand of zit cream? Which chair to sit in while I do everything? Come on, spit it out!

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Well you don't exactly make it easy, Rick!

sp.speaker: Morty 1
sp.p: : You make fun of me all the time and now Summer's doing it too!

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : You're always picking on me and now you got someone to kiss your ass!

sp.speaker: Summer 1
sp.p: : Me? What about you? Would you get more excited to see me fail? You want Grampa all to yourself!

sp.speaker: Summer 2
sp.p: : Me? You're just as mean to me because you're jealous, because you want Grampa all to yourself!

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Alright, cool it, I see what's happening here. You're both young, you're both unsure about your place in the universe, you both wanna be “Grampa's favorite.” I can fix this. Morty sit here, Summer, you sit here. Now listen, I know the two of you are very different from each other in a lot of ways, but you have to understand that as far as Grampa's concerned, you're both pieces of shit. Yeah, I can prove it mathematically. Actually, let me grab my whiteboard. This has been a long time coming anyway.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Emergency, wounded deer coming in.

sp.speaker: Vet
sp.p: : Three. Excuse me, you can't be back here.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : I'm a certified horse surgeon, and this deer needs medical attention. Nurse, please move that snake.

sp.speaker: Vet
sp.p: : That's my nurse, and as a horse surgeon, I'm sure that you know that deer have much smaller, much more intricate organs-

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : As a vet, I'm sure you know a deer is closer to a horse than you are to a doctor, so let's save the measuring for when our dicks are out, it's time to save a life!

sp.speaker: Vet
sp.p: : Geez...

body.stage: (Vet removes Snake from operating table. Beth and Jerry place deer on operating table.)

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : That's odd, this deer's wounded.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Uh, yeah, I was there, you don't have to rub it in.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : I mean it's been shot. With a gun.

sp.speaker: Hunter
sp.p: : My gun.

sp.speaker: Vet
sp.p: : May I help you, sir?

sp.speaker: Hunter
sp.p: : No, but you can stop helping this deer. I shot it before these two hit it with their car and I followed them when they hauled it off. This deer belongs to me.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: :sigh* We don't have time for this, okay! I need anesthetic, and deer saline!

sp.speaker: Vet
sp.p: : Look, I don't know what the law says about this, but I took an oath that I would let no animal come to harm. Except when sterilizing, aborting or euthenizing them and also when eating them at almost any meal.

sp.speaker: Hunter
sp.p: : I'm calling my lawyer. I hope for all our sakes you're as bad a surgeon as I am a hunter.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : In your dreams, bitch! Scalpel!

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : So in conclusion, you're both equally mercurial, overly sensitive, clingy hysterical bird brained homunculi. And I honestly can't tell the two of you half the time because I don't go by height or age, I go by amount of pain in my ass, which makes you both identical. Alright, everything resolved? Everybody nice and certain about their position in my world?

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Yes

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Yes.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Alright, perfect. Sit still, *belch* arms down, I'm gonna do this again, this time, be like Grampa.

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : You mean drunk?

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: : What's that? You got something to say?

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: : And away we go!

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : No.

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: : And away we go!

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Huh, that's weird. Oh, my God.

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : What?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : That son of a bitch is gonna kill me!

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: : Follicle unfeeling sociopath. Don't you get it? He thinks he can save his own skin by using the crystal to kill me. He probably figures it's easier to eliminate one of the possibilities rather than merge them. I have to admit, it's always in the back of my mind too. The difference is I would never do it! Until now...

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: : Don't you get it? don't you get it? The other Rick isn't trying to merge us anymore. He thinks he can save his own skin by using the crystal to kill me. He probably figures it's easier to eliminate one of the possibilities rather than merge them. I have to admit, it's always in the back of my mind too. The difference is I would never do it! Until now...

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Rick what the hell are you doing?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Saving our lives. After he takes me out he's gonna be coming for you!

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Who?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Me!

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: : You see that? Get down.

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Ahh!

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Whoa whoa!

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: : I told you he's a psycho!

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: : He's lost it. The time fracture must have made him crazy!

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: : I don't know what to do! I don't know what to do!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: 2 or 4 after splitting into 4 (not shown): Oh crap!

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Oh God, now there's three of them, we're outnumbered! Get in the cupboards! Wait, don't don't do that, they'll know... wait wait, think about getting in the cupboards but don't really. AAAAH IS THIS WHAT YOU WANT YOU SICK FUCKS? YOU WANNA SEE CHILDREN DIE?

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : You son of a bitch, you don't stop living until I SAY SO!

sp.speaker: Lawyer
sp.p: : Michael.

sp.speaker: Vet
sp.p: : Who's this now?

sp.speaker: Hunter
sp.p: : My lawyer.

sp.speaker: Lawyer
sp.p: : I'm here to notify you ma'am, that in this county, any deer shot by a hunter is that hunter's property, regardless of how far it runs, or who intercepts it before it dies. It's called Brad's law. We can't make you stop the surgery, but at this point you're performing it on venison.

sp.speaker: Hunter
sp.p: : Actually, I've decided not to eat it. All this fear and conflict. I'm sure it's ruined the meat. I'm just gonna use the head for my rec room wall.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : She normally works on horses.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Jerry, if you're not gonna help, get the fuck out of here! I will reach into heaven and yank your screaming deer soul back!

sp.speaker: Vet
sp.p: : Jesus...

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Shh shh... I know where you are, you creepy old monster... I know how you think! Oh, is this where you think I'm going? You think I'm standing here? Well maybe you're right!

body.stage: (Morty knocks Rick out with a fire extinguisher)

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Holy shit, now what?

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Well if all of me knocked out all the Ricks, and you peed in all of your pants, doesn't that mean that we're all synchronized?

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Right.

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Okay... so from now on, whatever we do we have to be certain.

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Right...

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : I think I'm certain we're F'd in the A.

body.stage: [Trans. Outside the house in Schrodinger cat space]

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Oh God, my head. What did you guys do?

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : We put you in a dog crate because you were acting crazy, and you caused another time fracture.

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : You tried to kill yourself!

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Only in self defense, myself tried to kill me first! Guys, I don't expect you to understand this, but time breaking twice means our problem is two times bigger and we've got half as much time to solve it. Well actually, I do expect you to understand that, it's basic math. C-could someone just let me out of here? If I die in a cage I lose a bet.

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Well is there some way you can prove you're not a threat to yourself and others anymore?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Ah, for God's sake, alright here, give me the time crystal.

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : W-what're you doing?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Calling myself. Here, listen, *belch* it'll probably go to voice mail since, you know, I'm calling myself.

sp.speaker: All Rick phones
sp.p: : Hello, Rick here.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Don't fall for it, it's a bit.

sp.speaker: All Rick phones
sp.p: : Just kidding, haha! You just got Ricked. You've reached Rick's voicemail, you know what to do *beep*.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Hey Rick, it's Rick. Listen, I'm sorry about earlier. No hard feelings. I know you know I mean it too. Take it easy. Whoa. Damn, look at this, I'm blown up. Three new voicemails. *voicemail repeats* Yeah yeah, I heard this one. *voicemail repeats two more times* You get the idea *belch* we're cool now.

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Okay, well we're still not gonna let you out of this crate.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Fine I'll just do it myself.

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : If you could get out that whole time why didn't you?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Because I waited until I was certain it was what I wanted to do, Morty. That's the difference between you and me. I'm certain, and you're a walking burlap sack filled with turds.

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : You know, geez Rick, y—y—you're really tearing into me right now. You know, words hurt.

body.stage: (Testicle Monster A floats into view in a bubble.)

sp.speaker: Morty 1
sp.p: : Oh, my God!

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: : It's a monster!

sp.speaker: Morty 3
sp.p: : Oh, my God! It's a monster!

sp.speaker: Summer 1
sp.p: : It's a monster!

sp.speaker: Summer 4
sp.p: : It's a monster!

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Ey, ye ey, quit yellin' quit yellin'.

sp.speaker: Summer 1
sp.p: : *Screams*

sp.speaker: Summer 4
sp.p: : Oh, my God...

sp.speaker: Morty 2, 3, and 4
sp.p: : *Screams*

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : What the fuck?! Your time is all ripped up to hell! You broke your time, twice!

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : *sigh*

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : How did this happen?

sp.speaker: Summers 2 & 3
sp.p: : Yeah, but we don't even know, the first time...

sp.speaker: Morty 1 & 4
sp.p: : Who's that Brother Newman time elf?

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Shut the fuck up! Oh, damn, I'm from the 4th dimension. I can hear all o' y'all. Now let's just see what we got here for a second.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : *groan*

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Ay, damn it, were you tryin' to use this to- oh, see, you broke time, and you thought you could just stick it back together with this? How you think you gonna move time while you're standin in it you dumn ass three-dimensional monkey ass dummies?

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: : Oh way to go, Rick.

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: : Yeah Grampa, way to go.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Oh, what you're just gonna listen to this guy now? He's got a giant testicle for a head! He came here in a bubble. For all we know he could be the David Berkowitz of Nutsack Land.

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Shut up. Here, put these on. They'll sync your possibilities up so I can bring you back to certain time. Y'all just-just negligent, now ay, ay, ay, the three of you, put your collars on!

sp.speaker: Summer 1, 2, and 3
sp.p: : What are you talking about?

sp.speaker: Morty 1, 2, and 3
sp.p: : We have them on.

sp.speaker: Rick 1, 2, and 3
sp.p: : Uh, we did...

sp.speaker: Rick 4
sp.p: : We're not wearing collars.

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Exactly, because you're being obstinate.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: 1, 2 and 3: *belch* What?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: 1, 2 and 3: We did!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: 1, 2 and 3: They're on right now.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: 4: Alright, fine. Summer, Morty, put 'em on.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Yes, we're back, problem solved.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Yes, we're back to our own time.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Yes no more cats, no more cats, oh you did it, you fixed it.

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Yeah, now keep those collars on so you don't break your weak ass time again.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : How long exactly do we have to wear these things? They're really embarassing.

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Well since you're goin' to time prison, I'd say you can keep em on forever.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Time prison?

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Yeah, well I don't know where you expect me to think you got that crystal over there, but the only way you dumb ass, assin' ass asses could ever have one, is if it was stolen.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : You stole a time freezing crystal from testical monsters?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I would have been happy to pay for it, Summer, but they don't exactly sell them at Costco. Besides, there's a larger lesson to be learned here. Get him!

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Ututututut! You'd better keep back! Man this will turn your ass into a third trimester fetus from 30 yards.

sp.speaker: Vet
sp.p: : Hmm...

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Isn't there a kitten somewhere that needs a manicure?

sp.speaker: Lawyer
sp.p: : That's right Mrs. Smith, *whispers* give in to your anger. Neglect that deer.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Honey, it's gonna be okay. These men are from the Cervine Institute of Elk, Moose Deer and Stag. They can take this deer to a helicopter and fly it to the country's top deer surgeon on a wildlife reserve across the state border, where your jurisdiction ends.

sp.speaker: Vet
sp.p: : I guess that's the end of that.

sp.speaker: Lawyer
sp.p: : There is just one more thing. According to this state's veterinarian statute, this animal can't be transferred until the current attending physician verbally confirms their inability to provide adequate care. You heard the man horse doctor, you have to say you couldn't hack it.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : We did it...

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : (On phone) Uh-huh, no motha- no, Earth, dude, I'm talking 'bout, yeah, with the dinosaurs. No, if you've get to the dolphin people, you've gone too far. Alright man, I'll talk to you later, okay. (hangs up) You know what they do with 3rd dimensional life forms in time prison? Same thing they do in every other prison, only forever.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Why are you doing this?

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : You think I wanna be an omniscient immortal being transcending time and space my whole life? I got ambitions man, bringin' you guys in is my ticket up.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : What if I told you there's a huge ticket up right behind you?

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : You really think I'm that stupid?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Alright, hear me out on this. You're immortal, right, which means your life is infinite. Well in that case there's 100% chance that you'll eventually do everything, including turning around to look behind you.

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : I cannot argue that.

body.stage: (Rick hits the creature with a wrench and grabs the organic gun he was holding)

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Ah, God, gross and weird!

body.stage: (Rick drops the gun and it crawls toward the street)

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Chris!

body.stage: (The gun/Chris runs into the road and is run over by a car)

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : You killed my gun!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Summer, Morty, take off your collars!

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : What? What the hell are you doing?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Good question. I suppose the answer is: I'm not certain!

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Oh, no, what are you doin'?

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: : I have no idea!

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: : I'm not sure.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: (off sync): Maybe I will, maybe I won't.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: (off sync): I'm really uncertain about everything, even kicking your ass!

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Lis- ay, to, AH. But these arms are vestigial. Now you poked me where an eye would have been about six million years ago.

sp.speaker: All Summers
sp.p: (off sync): Come on, let's help Grampa.

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: (off sync): Yeah. I'm like a hundred percent not sure about anything.

sp.speaker: Summers 1, 2, 3, 8, 9, 10, 12, 17, 18, 20, 25, 28, 29, 31
sp.p: : Beat his ass!

sp.speaker: Summers 1, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 10, 11, 14, 16, 18, 19, 23, 25, 27, 28
sp.p: : Get him!

sp.speaker: Summers 2, 6, 9, 12, 13, 15, 17, 20, 21, 22, 24, 26, 29, 30, 31, 32
sp.p: : Beat him up!

body.stage: (Zooms into only show one timeline: Timeline 23)

sp.speaker: Morty 23
sp.p: : Kick his ass, Rick!

body.stage: (Ricks, Mortys, and Summers hit Testicle Monster A one last time, he falls back and his head explodes.)

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Ow, I'm defeated...

sp.speaker: Summer 23
sp.p: : What's happening?

sp.speaker: Rick 23
sp.p: : Time is falling apart, we've got to get back to certainty, quick! Give me your collars!

sp.speaker: Morty 23
sp.p: : Oh man, don't you have to fix, like, thirty of them?

sp.speaker: Rick 23
sp.p: : Morty, I have to fix three of them, and then there's thirty-one other versions of me that have to also fix three for a total of 96. I'm not an idiot. I know how to be decisive, now hand me that (Phillips/Flathead) screwdriver. Actually, make it a (Phillips/Flathead).

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: (off sync): Oh, shit.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Look, I know I was kind of a nuisance today. I know it's my fault we hit the deer, and I know you wanted to be the one to save it.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Whatever. How petty would I have to be to care less about an animal's life than my own ego?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Hmm... you'd have to be pretty petty. But you'd still be the woman I married.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Where are we going?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : One last stop.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Where's the helicopter?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : There is no helicopter and there is no Cervine Institute.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : But the top deer surgeon...

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : I'm looking at her. Thanks for F.D.'ing me up like that.

sp.speaker: Cold Stone Employee
sp.p: : You'd better get moving, these lights are designed for basic ice cream work, they're not gonna last all night.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : I need five minutes.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Jerry, this was the most romantic weekend I've ever had.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Thanks to Cold Stone Creamery.

sp.speaker: Cold Stone Employee
sp.p: : You're welcome.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: : Okay, we're out of time. It's ironic, huh?

sp.speaker: Morty 30
sp.p: : Rick!

sp.speaker: Rick 30
sp.p: : What's goin' on?

sp.speaker: Morty 30
sp.p: : The collar, oh, the latch is broken! It won't latch closed around my neck!

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: Except Morty 30: What's wrong, how come our collars aren't green?

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: Except Rick 30: Obviously because someone doesn't know how to put his collar on and one of me is stuck trying to help him.

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: Except Morty 30: Don't blame this on me, you're the one that couldn't fix a latch!

sp.speaker: Rick 30
sp.p: : What are you talking about, it's not broken, Morty, I fixed it, just put it on!

sp.speaker: Morty 30
sp.p: : It won't close, it's broken!

sp.speaker: Rick 30
sp.p: : Fine, bring it here.

sp.speaker: Morty 30
sp.p: : Ooh, ooh, Rick!

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: Except Rick 30: Oh, really, Morty? Well I'm sorry, I'm not the one that's so fucking uncertain about everything!

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: Except Morty 30: You know what I'm certain of, Rick? I've really made up my mind about this, I never wanna see you again!

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: Except Rick 30: You're never gonna see anything again you little dummy! You killed us!

sp.speaker: Rick 30
sp.p: : Goddammit!

sp.speaker: Morty 30
sp.p: : Ooh

sp.speaker: Rick 30
sp.p: : Morty where's your collar I'll fix it

sp.speaker: Morty 30
sp.p: : I dropped it

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: Except Rick 30: What the hell? What have you done to me, Morty?

sp.speaker: Rick 30
sp.p: : I'm okay with this. Be good Morty. Be better than me. Bullsh*t The other collar! I'm not okay with this! I am not okay with this! Oh, sweet Jesus please let me live. Oh, my God I—I've gotta fix this thing, please God in Heaven, please, God, oh Lord, hear my prayers. Yes! Fuck you God! Not today, bitch.

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: Except Rick 30: Please, God, if there's a Hell, please be merciful to me.

sp.speaker: Rick 30
sp.p: : Yes I did it! There is no God! In your face. One dot, motherfuckers!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Yes, oh, yes, yes!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Woohoo! Whoo! Whoo!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh, that was a close call. Oh yeah, do it Rick, do it right.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : You know what I'm talking about, oh yeah. I'm gonna do the cabbage patch, Morty. Check me out I'm doing the cabbage patch dance. It's a classic dance, remember, like this. Oh shit look at that.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Do the cabbage patch. Do—do—do the dance.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Hey wait a second, how come you guys took longer to get here?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : I don't know. I think like one sixty-fourth of my collars didn't work. It's hard to keep straight now that I have sixty-three other memories of everything.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Yeah.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : But I feel like one of the sixty-four Ricks like, sacrificed himself for me, maybe, I think.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Shut up, Morty. The last time you felt something, we all almost died. You little s—piece of shit.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Hey guys, we're home.

body.stage: (Summer and Morty run up and hug Beth and Jerry, respectively.)

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Mom, Dad!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: Mom, Dad!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Um, hold the phone, where did you guys get those necklaces from? Uh, Lady Gaga, table for three, am I right?

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : *laughs*

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Are you guys Power Rangers? But only on one small part of your necks? Hey, do those things need batteries? Were they included? Clean up in the fruit isle! Not in a homophobic way though, they're just fruity necklaces is all I was saying.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : *laughing* I'm gonna pee my pants.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Doesn't feel so good, does it?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : No it doesn't. It hurts.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : I'm gonna pee-hee-hee.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Somebody call the planet of Tron, we have three Tron people over here. But seriously, are these Halloween costumes? Are you going as motorcycles? With green headlights instead of normal ones? Are you dogs? Robot dogs? Gosh, you guys are lame. Are those chokers from the 90's? What is this, a 90's nostalgia thing? Are you guys in that movie “The Craft” with Fairuza Balk?

body.stage: [Trans. Testicle Monster travelling through time, stops at ice age with a wooly mammoth in the background.]

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Hey man, when the hell were you?

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster B
sp.p: : Looking for you, asshole.

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : I told you past the dinosaurs.

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster B
sp.p: : You know how much time is past the dinosaurs? Half of all time!

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Come on, man, it's this way...

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster B
sp.p: : Come on, give me that thing, speed it up, he can't be this far back.

body.stage: [Monster A spots a man that looks Rick writing on a chalkboard]

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : There he is, there he is, there he is, there he is, stop, stop.

body.stage: [Man who looks like Rick turns around, it turns out to be Albert Einstein]

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster B
sp.p: : So that's the guy, huh?

sp.speaker: Testicle Monster A
sp.p: : Yeah, that's him. Hey, man, remember me? [he and Monster B start beating up Einstein, knocking him to the ground] I got something for your ass! You don't mess with time! You don't f*** with time, mother****er! [he and Monster B leave]

sp.speaker: Albert Einstein
sp.p: : I vill mess vith time!

body.stage: [Einstein gets up and determinately writes E=MC2 in the chalkboard]

sp.speaker: Albert Einstein
sp.p: : I vill mess vith time...
